h2_title: Boss Fight - Erlang, the Sacred Divinity
img_above_text:
# Prologue

Upon beginning your journey, you’ll be thrust into the role of the mythical Sun Wukong as he rebels against the Court of Heaven and its Heavenly Kings. Undaunted by their army, Sun Wukong calls them out, prompting the nephew of the Jade Emperor, Erlang Shen, to meet him in combat.

## Boss Fight - Erlang, the Sacred Divinity

Once nearly all his health is gone, a final scene will ensue, and as Sun Wukong transforms to fly off toward the forests, the Buddha’s magical circlet that Sun Wukong had been tricked into putting on flares, causing him to reel from an excruciating headache. Erlang seizes this moment to cast down Sun Wukong into the mountain, sealing him within a large stone egg and ending the tale of Sun Wukong.
img_below_text: Centuries later, an elder monkey recounts the tale of the Monkey King, and decrees that a Destined One may yet be able to follow in Sun Wukong’s footsteps by seeking out the Six Relics of the Monkey King’s Spirit - the Six Senses of the Great Sage. As luck would have it, you are that Destined One!Forest of Wolves

Preceding Text Summary:  
The preceding text describes the climactic battle between Sun Wukong, the rebellious Monkey King, and Erlang Shen, the nephew of the Jade Emperor. After a fierce fight, Sun Wukong is defeated and sealed within a stone egg, marking the end of his tale. This sets the stage for the narrative's transition to a new era.

Image Summary:  
The image depicts two figures standing on a rocky overlook, gazing at a vast, misty mountain landscape. One figure appears to be an elder monkey, while the other carries a staff and resembles a younger warrior. The caption, "And upon the return of the relics to Mount Huaguo, he may yet rise again..." suggests a connection to Sun Wukong's legacy and the potential for his revival, emphasizing the continuation of the story and the quest for the Six Relics.

Following Text Summary:  
The following text introduces a new chapter in the narrative, where an elder monkey recounts the tale of Sun Wukong and declares that a "Destined One" may follow in his footsteps by seeking the Six Relics of the Monkey King’s Spirit. The player is revealed to be this Destined One, tasked with embarking on a journey to uncover the Six Senses of the Great Sage.
